trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_SEQ_00<tab>F'mibhas of the Archers' Guild wishes you to deliver a sealed message to the markets.
TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_SEQ_01<tab>Take the sealed message you received from F'mibhas to the markets and deliver it to Parnell in the Shaded Bower.

TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_SEQ_02<tab>Parnell reveals that the message from F'mibhas was a request concerning the availability of stock at the markets. She wonders why the adventurer didn't simply speak with her directly, and reflects on the prickly impression outsiders have of Gridanians.
TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the sealed message to Parnell in the markets.
TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_FMIBHAS_000_1<tab>Hail, adventurer! Might you have a moment?
TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_FMIBHAS_000_2<tab>I am in need of a trustworthy soul to deliver a missive to Parnell. You can find her in the Shaded Bower, in the midst of the markets.
TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_FMIBHAS_000_3<tab>Hm? Why would I not simply go and speak with her myself?

TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_FMIBHAS_000_4<tab>Well, uh...as I am sure you have observed...Gridanians have a tendency to be rather... Ahem. I mean...<var 1A 02 /var>in person<var 1A 01 /var>, they can be...well...a little on the prickly side.
TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_FMIBHAS_000_5<tab>The matter is not urgent─simply hand over the missive the next time you find yourself in the markets. Please, as a favor from one adventurer to another!
TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_PARNELL_000_10<tab>Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Might you be looking to secure the services of a retainer?

TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_PARNELL_000_11<tab>What's this? A missive from F'mibhas, you say? Whatever could it be about? Let me see, now... ...Hm? She wants to know about the available stock of potions at the markets.

TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_PARNELL_000_12<tab>Hardly a matter that warrants a letter, much less the hiring of a courier! Why could she not ask the question in person? <sigh> I sense that adventurers from beyond our borders find Gridanians somewhat difficult to deal with.

TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_PARNELL_000_13<tab>Are we truly so devoid of warmth? If we mistrust outsiders, it is only because so many of them have brought chaos to the Twelveswood─and such sins as theirs are not soon forgotten. Yet...I suppose we <var 1A 02 /var>might<var 1A 01 /var> endeavor to be a little less...cold.
